## IOperationOptions interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options for constructing a new Operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IOperationOptions 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[logFilenameIdentifier](./rush-lib.ioperationoptions.logfilenameidentifier.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** This property is used in the name of the filename for the logs generated by this operation. This is a filesystem-safe version of the phase name. For example, an operation for a phase with name `_phase:compile` has a `logFilenameIdentifier` of `_phase_compile`<></>.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[phase](./rush-lib.ioperationoptions.phase.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[IPhase](./rush-lib.iphase.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The Rush phase associated with this Operation


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[project](./rush-lib.ioperationoptions.project.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[RushConfigurationProject](./rush-lib.rushconfigurationproject.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The Rush project associated with this Operation


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[runner?](./rush-lib.ioperationoptions.runner.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[IOperationRunner](./rush-lib.ioperationrunner.md) \| undefined


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ When the scheduler is ready to process this `Operation`<></>, the `runner` implements the actual work of running the operation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[settings?](./rush-lib.ioperationoptions.settings.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[IOperationSettings](./rush-lib.ioperationsettings.md) \| undefined


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Settings defined in the project configuration for this operation, can be overridden.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
